column4: I couldn't care less about the opioid crisis and people addicted to opiods.
column5: Why would you not care about the opioid crisis?

column7: You should have sympathy for those suffering. Some of the people involved are addicted and cannot get the help that they desperately need.

column4: Did you know that whenever I have a new interest, I make a fake internet personality for it? I'm up to 15 now.
column5: Seriously? How do you keep track of all of them? Are they all different?
column6: Yeah, I remember them all. I use them to keep my interests separated.
column7: It is wrong to mislead people for your own pleasure. People are expected to be honest about them selves when interacting with each other.
column8: I doubt they're being honest with me either. I really don't like when people think they need to be honest all the time.
column9: I understand that but if everyone thought like that then no one would ever tell the truth. Just try not to mislead people online and don't expect any type of meaningful relationship out of it. Building a relationship on a lie can only turn out badly.
